description: The Alpine Onset Merino 150 T-Shirt is your go-to base layer for early morning starts and afternoon bike rides, whether you're headed up a 14er or cruising to the market. The soft and breathable fabric comprises 47% recycled polyester and 47% wool, with just a touch of elastane for stretch. The natural wool fibers are perfect for regulating temperature, while the recycled polyester keeps things lightweight and quick drying. UPF 30 protects you from harmful sun rays, and the flat-seam construction ensures chafe-free comfort all day long. Built with lightweight, breathable comfort for any activity, the Alpine Onset Merino 150 T-Shirt is an essential addition to any closet.
name: Outdoor Research Alpine Onset Merino 150 T-Shirt - Mens

specs.value: 47% Merino Wool, 47% Recycled Polyester (Repreve), 6% Elastane Jersey
